definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
China Council for the Promotion of International Trade (CCPIT)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Cu4 jin4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中國國際貿易促進委員會

definition: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora/CITES
pinyin: Bin1 wei1 Ye3 sheng1 Dong4 Zhi2 wu4 zhong3 Guo2 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 瀕危野生動植物種國際貿易公約

sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提貨單是國際貿易和船運中一種很重要的單據。

sentences.english: It's ethnocentrism that leads to failure in international business.
sentences.chinese: 它的種族優越感從而導致其在國際貿易的失敗。

sentences.english: I graduated from Guilin Institute, majoring in the professional practice of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我畢業於桂林山水學院，主修的是國際貿易實務專業。

sentences.english: Globalisation is a catch-all to describe increased international trade.
sentences.chinese: “全球化”是個泛稱，用以描述增進了的的國際貿易。

sentences.english: Containerization was first introduced in international trade in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 集裝箱化是六十年代引入國際貿易的。

sentences.english: In accordance with international trade practices, the consequences should be borne by the buyer.
sentences.chinese: 遵循國際貿易慣例，後果應由進購方承擔。

sentences.english: We all know that English has become the language of international trade and culture interflow .
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，英語已經成爲國際貿易和文化交流的語言。

sentences.english: We need to continue the liberalizing of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要繼續把國際貿易自由化。

sentences.english: The idea of comparative advantage has become the cornerstone of mordern thinking on international trade.
sentences.chinese: 比較利益理論他成爲現代國際貿易思想的基礎。

sentences.english: International trade and investment volumes within the Asia-Pacific region are rapidly expanding everywhere on the globes .
sentences.chinese: 亞太地區的國際貿易和投資量正在全球各處迅速擴大。

sentences.english: I have rich experience in international business.
sentences.chinese: 我對國際貿易有豐富的經驗。

sentences.english: The milk scandal is already complicating international trade, with the discovery of contaminated products.
sentences.chinese: 奶品醜聞已經令國際貿易複雜化。

sentences.english: Zhou Minmin, a 19-year-old business major at Wuhan University, is the apple of her parents` eye.
sentences.chinese: 19歲的周敏敏是武漢大學國際貿易專業的學生。

sentences.english: Our company is an international trade-oriented company.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司是面向國際貿易的公司。

sentences.english: Two years ago, I graduated from Tsinghua University. I majored in International Trade.
sentences.chinese: 兩年前我畢業於清華大學，主修國際貿易。

sentences.english: There are home and source currencies in order to be able to deal with transactions with foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 在國際貿易中會涉及本位幣與源貨幣。

definition: conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
